eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 04:18 PM ON OCT 30, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:36 AM OCT 31, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Turquoise Alert has been issued for Arizona. Peoria Police Department is looking for endangered 16 year old white male, Chandler Ikard, 5 feet 9, 140 pounds, brown hair, brown eyes, last seen at 6:30 AM near 95th Avenue and Beardsley Road, wearing a black and gray vest. Contact 911 with any info or sighting. If you have contact with the missing person, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
